title: KISSPharm_2013
description:
KISSPharm: Keeping It Simple Series for the USMLE, COMLEX, NCLEX, and more.

15 lecture videos and accompanying lecture notes
- Pharmacokinetics Intro by Dr Francis
- Pharmacokinetics
- Autonomic Nervous System Lecture
- Cardiac Pharmacology
- Steroids, Opiates, NSAIDS, Prostaglandins
- Endocrine & Reproductive Pharmacology
- Renal Pharmacology
- Hematology Pharmacology
- Immunology
- Cancer Pharmacology
- Behavioral Science Pharmacology
- Gastrointestinal Pharmacology
- Neuroscience Pharmacology
- Microbiology Pharmacology
- High Yield Rapid Review
- High Yield Rapid Review (with ppt)

From kisspharmacology.com:

The KISSPharm Difference

Learn pharmacology the easy way with KISSPharmÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s online pharmacology lecture series. Want help learning USMLE pharmacology, COMLEX pharmacology, NCLEX pharmacology, etc? Our online pharmacology lecture videos simplify pharmacology and facilitate life long understanding of pharmacology for the USMLE, COMLEX, NCLEX and more.

KISSPharm has been proven to work. Just ask one of our students! KISSPharm works so well that Dr. Francis Ihejirika provides it to every P.A.S.S. Program student in Champaign, Illinois.

All PASS students must watch all of our online pharmacology lecture videos to be eligible for the PASS Program Guarantee! This is because students who have used KISSPharm have had great success and improvements!

While other programs overload you with a plethora of information and lengthy videos, KISSPharmÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 15 lectures focus on patterns and concepts. This allows medical professionals to have a thought process grounded in the fundamentals of medicine. No longer will you have to memorize lists without understanding how a medication works, We even allow you to gauge your progress with our own pharmacology practice questions!

KISSPharm will not only save you time, it will enable you to succeed on your upcoming exams.

If you still donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t believe us, give us a chance to change your mind! Watch our sample lecture on autonomic pharmacology, or our mini lesson on Cephalosporins and AIDS treatments, COMLEX pharmacology, NCLEX pharmacology, and PANCE pharmacology can help you maximize your potential.
